org.webcurator.core.store.tools
Class QualityReviewFacade

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.store.tools.QualityReviewFacade

public class QualityReviewFacade
extends java.lang.Object

This facade provides the methods required for the Quality Review Tools.

Author:
bbeaumont

getSmallResource

public byte[] getSmallResource(HarvestResourceDTO dto)
                        throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Get a harvested resource from the digital asset store as a byte array. This tends to be faster, but has higher memory requirements so should only be used for smaller resources.

Parameters:
dto - The DTO HarvestResource to retrieve.
Returns:
The resource as a byte array.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

copyAndPrune

public HarvestResult copyAndPrune(long harvestResultOid,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> urisToDelete,
                                  java.util.List<HarvestResourceDTO> hrsToImport,
                                  java.lang.String provenanceNote,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> modificationNotes)
                           throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Copy a Harvest Result and remove all the URLs in the urisToDelete list and import all the HarvestResourceDTOs in the hrsToImport list.

Parameters:
harvestResultOid - The OID of the harvest result to copy.
urisToDelete - The List of URLs to delete from the copy.
hrsToImport - The list of HarvestResourceDTO to import to the copy.
provenanceNote - A note to explain why the contents were pruned and/or added to.
Returns:
The HarvestResult for the pruned copy.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if anything fails.

setAuditor

public void setAuditor(Auditor auditor)
Parameters:
auditor - the auditor to set
